events.title: Prayer Clinic
events.description: An early morning session of powerful prayer and intercession. All are welcome to start their week in God's presence.

events.title: Basenta Area Prayers
events.description: A weekly gathering for all church members in the Basenta area for a time of fellowship and focused prayer.

events.title: Area Center Service
events.description: Join us for our mid-week service for a time of worship, prayer, and fellowship.

events.title: Invitation Sunday
events.description: Extend an invitation to friends and family! A special service designed to welcome newcomers into our church family.
